scripts.setup: npm i && cd services/api && npm i && cd ../ui && npm i && cd ../smart-contracts && npm i && cd ../../ && node scripts/copy-envs.js
scripts.start: npm run deploy:smart-contracts && docker-compose up --build nginx api ui ganache mongo
scripts.start:detached: npm run deploy:smart-contracts && docker-compose up --build -d nginx api ui ganache mongo
scripts.restart: docker-compose stop && npm run deploy:smart-contracts && docker-compose up --build nginx api ui ganache mongo
scripts.restart:detached: docker-compose stop && npm run deploy:smart-contracts && docker-compose up --build -d nginx api ui ganache mongo
scripts.test:smart-contracts: docker-compose restart ganache && docker-compose build smart-contracts && docker-compose run smart-contracts test
scripts.test:coverage:smart-contracts: docker-compose build ganache && docker-compose restart ganache && docker-compose build smart-contracts && docker-compose run smart-contracts test:coverage
scripts.lint:smart-contracts: docker-compose build smart-contracts && docker-compose run smart-contracts lint
scripts.deploy:smart-contracts: docker-compose restart ganache && docker-compose stop smart-contracts && docker-compose up --build -d smart-contracts && docker-compose run smart-contracts deploy && node scripts/move-contract-artifacts-to-ui-api.js
